instructions.1: Bake, cool and remove the "tops" of the pastry shells according to the package directions.
instructions.2: Place 2 slices corned beef into each pastry shell. Top each with 1 teaspoon mustard, 1 tablespoon sauerkraut and 1 piece cheese folded in half.
instructions.3: Bake at 400 degrees F for 5 minutes or until the cheese is melted. Serve with the dressing, if desired.

questions.question: Is pastry shells from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is pastry shells live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we bake (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
